outputs.output_descr: Technical and operational support provided to the public sector reform programme including placement of short/medium term TA; a results and performance management platform is further enhanced and consolidated, a system of performance monitoring strengthened and service delivery improved in targeted MDAs

project_descr: Specifically, the programme seeks to establish a leaner, performance oriented, well motivated, modern and efficient civil service that delivers high quality services to its clients in a timely, transparent and cost effective manner.
project_title: SUPPORT TO PUBLIC SECTOR REFORM & CAPACITY DEVELOPMENT
